Text: steam needed to run this, also, openal32.dll needed in directory. Does not run straight after install on windows 7, needs steam crack.

steam don't need to run, there are a loader with in release.

'revloader', launched by the shortcut after the instal

this isn't an installer, just a compressed folder.

you'll likely need to install OpenAL
http://connect.creativelabs.com/openal/Downloads/oalinst.zip
and PhysX
http://www.nvidia.com/object/physx_9.09.1112.html

Unsure if you would need to install anything else. when i saw physx i did a 180 and just deleted the game from my system (nothing bad about physx, just dont care for it)
